divs: Sighting DetailsTHE UFO FLEW OVER ROCKLAND LAKE TOWARDS MY DADS HOUSE. WE WHERE OUTSIDE WHEN WE SAW IT IT, WAS HUAGE IT FLEW RIGHT OVER MY DADS HOUSE LIKE IT WAS LOOKING FOR SOMETHING. THEN THREE HELACOPTORS FLEW TOWARDS IT THE UFO STOPED RIGHT OVER MY DAS HOUSE THEN FLASHED LIKE IT WENT INTO WARPSPEED THE THREE HELACOPTORS FLEW AWAY REAL FAST. THE NEXT DAY THE PAPER SAID IT WAS THE STLETH,THAT WAS NO STLETH IT WAS WAY TO BIG LIKE THE LENGTH OF A FOOTBALL FEILD. I WAS FROZON I COULD NOT BELIVE WHAT I SAW. TWO DAY LATER TWO MEN CAME TO MY DAS DOOR SAYING THEY WHERE FBI AN WANTED TO KNOW WHAT WE SAW I SAID WELL THE PAPER SAID IT WAS THE STLETH RIGHT THE TWO FBI SAID YES AND LEFT
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around April 16th 1994
Summary: THE UFO WAS DIAMOND SHAPE WITH RED BLUE YELLOW LIGHTS UNDER IT
